title: Icicle Melting Steps
description: Given icicle lengths, each hour subtract the current smallest length from all icicles and remove any that reach zero. Output how many icicles remain after each hour until none remain.
input_format: A comma-separated list of integer lengths.
output_format: One integer per line: remaining icicles after each hour.

sample_tests.explanation: After first hour 2 remain, then 1, then 0.
